pages.text: Combine the $(item)rocks/$ and $(item)lumps of clay/$ you get from the water strainers into various types of cobblestone.$(p)Using a $(item)Pit Kiln/$, the cobble can be smelted into its smooth equivalent. You can smelt a stack of up to 8 items at a time.

$(item)Stone/$ and $(item)granite/$ are important right now, to allow the creation of the $(item)Granite Anvil/$ and $(item)masonry bricks/$.$(p)Excess rocks can be converted into $(item)gravel/$ in a $(item)Compacting Bin/$, by right clicking it while holding rocks, then right clicking the bin with a shovel.
